heading: blast off
subheading: thousands gathered to watch the final countdown at launch complex 41 thursday. as usual, it ended with a deafening roar, but this time it was different. instead of a titan rocket hurtling into space, it was 180 pounds of explosives blowing the historic launch pad at cape canaveral to smithereens. the complex, which was built in 1965 and saw the launch of numerous viking and voyager missions, was destroyed to make room for a new launch facility.
author: wired staff
text: thousands gathered to watch the final countdown at launch complex 41 thursday. as usual, it ended with a deafening roar, but this time it was different. instead of a titan rocket hurtling into space, it was 180 pounds of explosives blowing the historic launch pad at cape canaveral to smithereens. the complex, which was built in 1965 and saw the launch of numerous viking and voyager missions, was destroyed to make room for a new launch facility.
